title: Introduction
body:
Beyond a technical solution

Humanitarian assistance should be impartial, people-centred, transparent and accountable even when there are difficulties, challenges and obstacles. It is vital that you keep people safe from harm and do not inadvertently make the situation worse.

Effective assistance engages the affected population. It enables them to play a positive and practical role in their own recovery.

title: Introduction
body:
People Centered
Humanitarian assistance and protection should be delivered according to need, where governments are not able, or not willing, to fill the gap.Be aware of any deliberate or accidental acts of unfairness or discrimination, and take action to make sure the most at-risk receive the assistance they need. Acknowledge that you and your organisation cannot cover all the needs and that you should identify gaps and advocate for resources to fill them.

title: Introduction
body:
Information is aid

As we know, the drought in Abudi has been a large-scale, slow-onset crisis. The poor harvest yields were, in part, predicted several months before. More could have been done to communicate with and forewarn the affected population during this

“alert phase” of the drought. Timely information would have helped them better prepare for what was to come.

Let us look back to that phase now and witness a conversation between Kanina, a government official, and Naya, a humanitarian

instruction: Select each question Kanina asks in order to read Naya's response.

_items.title: What should we do?
_items.body:
How do we know people will believe what we say? What is the best way to approach this?

Naya: “We need to work hard to build strong relationships of trust based on two-way, open and honest dialogue.

“Let us work out strategies to provide everyone with the latest weather reports, market prices for livestock and food, and other essential information. We need to make sure that we use the right language, the most appropriate channels, and the best people to communicate in culturally acceptable ways.”

title: Introduction
body:
What is the Sphere Handbook?

The Sphere Handbook consists of four foundation chapters and four technical chapters. It is important to understand that the different chapters are closely interconnected, and to use the Handbook holistically.
